Identities.Title: title
Identities.Innate Power: Three non-character hero targets regain 1 HP each.
Incapacitated: Two hero targets regain 1 HP each.
One player may draw a card.
Select a damage type. Reduce damage of that type dealt to hero targets by 1 until the start of your turn.

The Element of Kindness.text: The first time each turn any Pet regains HP, a target regains 1 HP.
The Element of Kindness.power: Fluttershy deals a target X energy damage, where X = the number of Elements in play.

Bear call.power: A Pet regains 2 HP and deals a target 2 melee damage. That Pet may then deal each other non-hero target 2 melee damage. If it does, destroy this card.

The Stare.start of turn: At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
The Stare.text: Pets and non-hero non-character targets have no end of turn effects. You cannot use powers.

Pony-Pet Playdate.text: The first time any Pet enters play each turn, it regains 1 HP.
Pony-Pet Playdate.power: Play up to three Pets. Each regains 1 HP. If more than one Pet entered play this way, destroy this card.

Everfree Cottage.text: Reduce environment damage dealt to Pets by 2.

modifiers.text: -2 Damage dealt to pets by environment

Everfree Cottage.power: Each target in your play area regains 1 HP.

Rabbit Roundup.text: When one of your Pets would be destroyed, you may prevent that destruction and restore that Pet to 3 HP, then destroy this card.
Rabbit Roundup.on entry: When this card enters play, a target regains 2 HP.

How Dare You!.start of turn: At the start of your turn, destroy all other copies of this card.
How Dare You!.text: When a Pet is destroyed by a villain card, a villain target deals itself 2 psychic damage.
How Dare You!.on entry: When this card enters play, you may play a Pet from your hand or trash.

Find a Pet.text: Each player either draws a card or reveals cards from the top of their deck until a target is revealed, puts it in their hand, and shuffles the other cards into their deck. Collect a Pet, salvage a Pet or play a card. If you play a Pet this way, it regains 2 HP.

A Lovely Picnic.text: Five targets not at full HP regain 2 HP each. When a non-hero target regains HP this way, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your turn.

Fuzzylegs.end of turn:
At the end of your turn, this card deals a target 1 toxic damage.
	 :) Reduce damage dealt by a target that took damage this way by 1 until the start of your turn.

Giant Monarch.text: :) A target dealt damage this way deals another non-hero target 3 melee damage.
Giant Monarch.end of turn: At the end of your turn, this card may deal a target 1 psychic damage.

Dark and Mysterious.end of turn:
At the end of your turn, this card may deal a target 2 sonic damage.
	:) Destroy a target reduced to 3 or fewer HP this way.

Hummingway.end of turn:
At the end of your turn, this card may deal a target 1 melee and 1 sonic damage.
	 :) Damage dealt by this card is irreducible.

Mr. Mousey.text: When this card regains HP, two other hero targets regain 1 HP each.
Mr. Mousey.end of turn: :) At the end of your turn, a hero target regains 2 HP.

Squirrely.end of turn:
>:] At the end of your turn, you may discard a card and draw a card.
	:) At the end of your turn, you may draw a card.

The Jackalope.end of turn:
>:] At the end of your turn, this card deals the non-hero target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage.
	:) At the end of your turn, this card may deal a target 3 melee damage.

Angel Bunny.text:
>:] When Fluttershy is dealt damage, this card deals the source of that damage 1 melee damage.
	:) The first time Fluttershy and any Pet are dealt damage by any non-hero target each turn, this card deals the source of that damage 2 melee damage.

Elizabeak.text: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1. When a Pet would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to this card.
Elizabeak.end of turn: :) At the end of your turn, this card may deal a target 1 melee damage.

Regal Eagle.end of turn:
>:] At the end of your turn, you may discard a card and play a card.
	:) At the end of your turn, you may play a card.

Li'l Piggington.end of turn:
At the end of your turn, reveal and replace the top card of a deck.
	:) Then you may discard the top card of a deck or bury the top card of a trash.

Beaverton.end of turn:
>:] At the end of your turn, you may destroy a non-target environment card.
	:) At the end of your turn, destroy up to 2 ongoing and/or environment cards. If 2 cards are destroyed this way, this card deals itself 2 irreducible psychic damage.

Buzzing Buzzard.end of turn:
>:] At the end of your turn, this card deals the three non-hero targets with the lowest HP 1 sonic damage each.
	:) At the end of your turn, this card deals each non-hero target 2 sonic damage.

The Orthros.end of turn:
>:] At the end of your turn, this card deals the two non-hero targets with the highest HP 2 melee damage each.
	:) At the end of your turn, this card deals up to two targets 2 melee and 1 toxic damage each.

Smoky & Softpad.end of turn:
>:] At the end of your turn, a player may move a card from their trash to the top of their deck.
	:) Then this card deals up to two targets 2 melee damage each.

Harry the Bear.end of turn:
At the end of your turn, this card may deal a target 4 melee damage.
	:) If it does not, select a target. If that target is a character, prevent the next damage it would deal. If not, it cannot deal damage until the start of your next turn.
